dataset.title: Litter and root decomposition in alpine tundra.

address.deliveryPoint: Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research

abstract.para: Plant tissues, foliage, and roots were collected from Niwot Ridge tundra species and composited into separate 2-gm samples. Foliage was placed in 10x20 cm litter bags with a 2mm^2 mesh to allow entry of invertebrates. Root tissues were placed in 10x20 cm^2 polyester fabric bags to prevent loss of fine root particulates. The foliage litter bags were placed on the tundra surface and secured by 10-penny nails. Root bags were buried in slits 15 cm deep. Each of the 18 1-m^2 research plots, consisted of 2 rows of 5 surface litterbags each. The upper row (with respect to slope) served as the control. The lower row was treated with ammonium nitrate at a rate of 20 g per m^2. Nitrogen will be applied at 3 monthly intervals during each of the growing seasons for the duration of the study. Litter bags (1 surface and 1 buried from each control and treatment) were collected from each plot on 18 September 1993. Additional collections are to be made in spring and fall of 1994 and spring of 1995. The samples are to be analyzed for changes in total mass, N concentration, and variation in C fractions.

description.para: The initial iteration of the documentation section of this file was generated by David Bryant and Rick Ingersoll on 15 March 1994. [RCI 15 March 1994] Additional comments and modifications were made on 29 March 1994. Data through the 18 September 1993 harvest were appended to the data section and the file was put under sccs control on 29 March 1994.[RCI 29 March 1994] Data for the June 1994 harvest were appended to the data section on 28 December 1994. A discrepancy between the plot and moisture treatment codes for litter bag 063 were corrected on that date as well.[RCI 28 December 1994] Plot locations and descriptions of analytical methods, as well as some preliminary litter nitrogen content data were added to the documentation section on 24 January 1995. On that same date 10 additional columns were added to the data section and the header section was updated accordingly. Missing value indicators of "999.99" were converted to absence of value for the sake of consistency and data for the 25 September 1994 harvest were appended to the data section on 24 January 1995.[RCI 24 January 1995] Some comments provided by David Bryant were incorporated into the documentation section and plot codes were standardized in both the documentation and data sections as per instructions of Byrant on 14 March 1995.[RCI 14 March 1995] The header section was refined and the data section was replaced as per instructions of Bryant on 6 April 1995. Additional detail regarding these changes is provided in the comments section.[RCI 6 April 1995] Additional details with regard to treatment codes provided by David Bryant were incorporated into the comments section on 12 June 1995. Corrections provided by DB for bag numbers 061 (moisture treatment M --> W), 161 (nitrogen treatment H --> L), 182 (plot code TD2 --> TD3), 183 (plot code TD2 --> TD3), 190 (plot code TD2 --> TD3), and 206 (plot code TM2 --> TM2) were made to the data section on that date as well. [RCI 12 June 1995] Data for the root-tissue bags used to generate a transport loss and oven- to air-dried conversion factors, were appended to the data section on 19 June 1995. Data for 7 bags harvested in June 1994 were appended on 19 June 1995.[RCI 19 June 1995] The incorrect processing program had been run on the 7 bags harvested in June 1994 and processed on 19 June 1995, so that the weight loss and percent weight loss values had not been calculated. These data were reprocessed and the weight loss and percent weight loss values were added to the appropriate locations in the data section on 23 June 1995.[RCI 23 June 1995] It was determined that there was an error in the processing programs which calculated weight loss, percent weight loss, and the final derived total weight (COL16, COL17, and COL23 respectively). The programs were corrected, and the effected data were replaced in the data section on 16 August 1995.[MAH 16 August 1995] A comment regarding rounding differences was incorporated into the comments section.[MAH 24 October 1995] The metadata for the units in Col 27 and 27 were updated to be more consistent with units of the niwot ridge database.[TMA 9 August 2004]
